trans-unit.source: Holds information relating to the change of execution status event for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações relacionadas à alteração de evento de status de execução para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que gerou o evento correspondente ao valor quando o evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que gerou o evento correspondente ao valor quando o evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que gerou o evento correspondente ao valor quando o evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que gerou o evento correspondente ao valor quando o evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Contains the following strings in the order of description:
trans-unit.target: Contém as seguintes cadeias de caracteres na ordem de descrição:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> as an enumeration converted to string, of the originating <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> como uma enumeração convertidos para cadeia de caracteres de origem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult> as an enumeration converted to string, of the originating <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult> como uma enumeração convertidos para cadeia de caracteres de origem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
